5: GREAT becomes PERFECT for {{8;d}} seconds and score increases by {{5;v}}% for {{5;d}} seconds
6: GOOD or higher becomes PERFECT for {{9;d}} seconds and score increases by {{6;v}}% for {{6;d}} seconds
7: BAD or higher becomes PERFECT for {{10;d}} seconds and score increases by {{7;v}}% for {{7;d}} seconds
8: Life is restored by {{14;v}} and score is increased by {{11;v}}% for {{11;d}} seconds
9: Life is restored by {{15;v}} and score is increased by {{12;v}}% for {{12;d}} seconds
10: Life is restored by {{16;v}} and score is increased by {{13;v}}% for {{13;d}} seconds
11: Score increases by {{17;v}}% for {{17;d}} seconds only for PERFECT hit
